extendedInfo.description: Have you enjoyed Calories Burned Calculator. Then here is the pro version of that app. The user interface is improved. Also many functionality such as Adding your own activity, Creating graph for comparing your daily calories burned and calories intake. Please give your valuable comments to constantly update this app. Tags: Calories, Burned, Pro, Activity, Exercise, Health, Fitness, food, Calculator, Graph, Comparison

reviews.title: Galaxy note
reviews.comment: Freezes and force closes Everytime I go into it.
reviews.author: Ashley Hoff

reviews.title: Best calorie counter!
reviews.comment: Love the large variety, has every activity/workout you can imagine. I use this app daily, love it!
reviews.author: Samara Nicole

reviews.title: Close but no cigar
reviews.comment: I\'ve been trying to find an app to estimate my time spent walking at work since I work for amazon we can\'t have anything they sell on us just about everything I work a 10 hour shift on my feet and I can only calculate up to 9. Give me ten and ill give you five ur the only app so far that I see that allows one to estimated certain activities.
reviews.author: Nicki Jae
